turns.en: Welcome to our hotel. How can I help you?
turns.zh: 歡迎來到本飯店，我可以怎麼幫你？

turns.hint_en: I'd like to check in, please.

turns.en: May I have your name and reservation?
turns.zh: 可以給我姓名和訂房資訊嗎？

turns.en: Could I see your passport or ID?
turns.zh: 可以看一下護照或身分證嗎？

turns.en: How many nights will you be staying?
Do you prefer a king bed or two twins?
turns.zh: 你想要一大床還是兩小床？
